title: Senate Trumpcare Would Leave 22 Million More Uninsured: A Closer Look | Mayor Pete Buttigieg
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Trump's ever-changing story about why he fired James Comey and the latest GOP tactics for promoting their health care bill that could leave 22 million people uninsured. (0:22)
Then, Mayor Pete Buttigieg of South Bend, Indiana chats with Seth about successfully governing as a progressive Democrat in a very red state. (11:49)
After that, Late Night producer Henry Melcher asks Mayor Buttigieg a few more questions about his responsibility to the people of South Bend backstage at Studio 8G. (19:09)
